problems.title: Hello World
problems.description: Write a program to display Hello World.

problems.title: Basic Program Structure
problems.description: Write a program showing the basic structure of a program.

problems.title: Comments in C
problems.description: Write a program with both single-line and multi-line comments.

problems.title: Print Multiple Lines
problems.description: Write a program that prints three lines: GenSpark, Coding, Platform

problems.title: Print with Spacing
problems.description: Print 'Hello   World' with multiple spaces in between.

problems.title: Swap without Third Variable
problems.description: Swap two numbers a=10 and b=20 without using a third variable.

problems.title: Even or Odd
problems.description: Write a program that checks if a number x=7 is even or odd.

problems.title: Max of Two Numbers
problems.description: Find the maximum of two numbers: a=15, b=8

problems.title: Simple Calculator
problems.description: Perform addition of two numbers: 20 + 15

problems.title: Loop: Count 1 to 5
problems.description: Print numbers from 1 to 5 using a loop.

problems.title: Sum of First N Numbers
problems.description: Calculate sum of first 10 numbers (1+2+3+...+10)

problems.title: Factorial Calculation
problems.description: Calculate factorial of 5 (5! = 5×4×3×2×1)

problems.title: Check Prime Number
problems.description: Check if 13 is a prime number.

problems.title: Sum of Digits
problems.description: Find the sum of digits of the number 12345 (1+2+3+4+5).

problems.title: Leap Year Check
problems.description: Check if the year 2024 is a leap year.

problems.title: GCD of Two Numbers
problems.description: Find the Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) of 36 and 48.

problems.title: Decimal to Binary
problems.description: Convert decimal number 13 to its binary representation.

problems.title: Square Function
problems.description: Write a function 'square' that returns the square of an integer.

problems.title: Add Two Numbers Function
problems.description: Create a function 'add' that adds two numbers: add(10, 20)

problems.title: Multiply Function
problems.description: Create a function that multiplies three numbers: 5, 6, 3

problems.title: Power Function
problems.description: Write a function to calculate power: 2^5 (2 raised to power 5)

problems.title: Array Sum
problems.description: Calculate the sum of all elements in the array {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}.

problems.title: Find Maximum in Array
problems.description: Find the maximum element in array {5, 2, 8, 1, 9, 3}

problems.title: Find Minimum in Array
problems.description: Find the minimum element in array {15, 7, 12, 3, 9}

problems.title: Array Reverse
problems.description: Reverse the array {1, 2, 3, 4, 5} and print it.

problems.title: Count Even Numbers
problems.description: Count even numbers in array {2, 5, 8, 3, 10, 7}

problems.title: Merge Two Sorted Arrays
problems.description: Merge {1, 3, 5} and {2, 4, 6} into one sorted array.

problems.title: Swap Values
problems.description: Swap the values of two variables using pointers.

problems.title: Pointer to Variable
problems.description: Create a pointer to an integer and print its value.

problems.title: Address of Variable
problems.description: Print the address of a variable x = 100

problems.title: String Length
problems.description: Write a manual function to find the length of a string (don't use strlen).

problems.title: Reverse a String
problems.description: Reverse the string 'Hello' using a loop.

problems.title: Count Vowels in String
problems.description: Count vowels in the string 'Programming'

problems.title: String Concatenation
problems.description: Concatenate two strings 'Hello ' and 'World'

problems.title: Palindrome String Check
problems.description: Check if the string 'level' is a palindrome.

problems.title: Character Frequency
problems.description: Find the frequency of character 'a' in 'apple is a fruit'.

problems.title: Anagram Check
problems.description: Check if 'listen' and 'silent' are anagrams.

problems.title: Point Struct
problems.description: Define a struct 'Point' with x and y coordinates. Initialize p1(10, 20) and print it.

problems.title: Student Struct
problems.description: Create a struct for a student with name and marks. Print details for 'Alice' with marks 85.

problems.title: Rectangle Struct
problems.description: Create a Rectangle struct with length and width. Calculate area for l=10, w=5.

problems.title: Write File
problems.description: Open a file named 'test.txt' and write 'C is fun' to it.

problems.title: Read and Display File Content
problems.description: Read content from a file 'data.txt' and display it.

problems.title: Linear Search
problems.description: Search for number 7 in array {1, 7, 3, 9, 2, 7, 5}

problems.title: Bubble Sort
problems.description: Sort array {5, 2, 8, 1, 9} in ascending order using bubble sort.

problems.title: Binary Search
problems.description: Search for 42 in sorted array {10, 20, 30, 42, 50, 60}.

problems.title: Selection Sort
problems.description: Sort array {64, 25, 12, 22, 11} using Selection Sort.

problems.title: Factorial using Recursion
problems.description: Calculate factorial of 5 using recursion: factorial(5)

problems.title: Fibonacci Number
problems.description: Find the 6th Fibonacci number using recursion.

problems.title: Power using Recursion
problems.description: Calculate 2^5 using recursion.

problems.title: Dynamic Array Sum
problems.description: Allocate memory for an array of 5 integers using malloc, fill it with {10, 20, 30, 40, 50}, calculate sum, and free it.

problems.title: Bitwise Check
problems.description: Check if the 3rd bit (from right, 0-indexed) of number 13 is set (1) or not.

problems.title: Typedef Struct
problems.description: Create a typedef 'Complex' for a struct with float 'real' and 'imag'. Initialize and print '3.0 + 4.0i'.

problems.title: Union Representation
problems.description: Define a union 'Data' with 'int i' and 'float f'. Set 'f' to 2.5 and print it.

problems.title: Enum Days
problems.description: Define an enum 'Day' (Sun=0, Mon, Tue, etc.). Print the value of 'Wed'.
